ruleSearch.name: h3@text
ruleSearch.author: ul>li:nth-of-type(2)@text##(作者：?:?\s*)##
ruleSearch.lastChapter: {{"【该源搜索页不展示最新章节】"}}

ruleBookInfo.name: div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:first-of-type>h1@text
ruleBookInfo.author: div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:nth-of-type(2)>a@text
ruleBookInfo.kind: div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:nth-of-type(3)@text&&div[class="pure-u-xl-5-6 pure-u-lg-5-6 pure-u-md-2-3 pure-u-1-2"]>ul>li:nth-of-type(4)@text&&div.near_chapter>time@text##(类别：?:?|状态：?:?)##
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>
let bookId = baseUrl.split("/").slice(-1)[0];
let chapterList = java.ajax(`https://ttkan.co/api/nq/amp_novel_chapters?novel_id=${bookId}`);
java.put("bookId",bookId);
java.put("chapterList",chapterList);
chapterList;
</js>
$.items[-1].chapter_name

ruleExplore.name: $.name
ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.lastChapter: {{"【该源发现页无最新章节信息】"}}

bookSourceComment:
目标书籍更新较快；
简中部分目录不全，故使用繁中目录；
偶尔段落乱序，且不会修复；
正文页需要使用VPN访问；
